author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: BassGuitarTips.com Introduces The Language Of Bass Method: A Natural Approach to Bass Mastery | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: BassGuitarTips.com, a leading platform in bass guitar education, is introducing an innovative approach to mastering the bass guitar – The Language Of Bass Method™. Designed specifically for bass players unable to achieve breakthroughs in their playing, this method reimagines music education by drawing parallels to language acquisition, enabling players to reach a new level of fluency and creativity on the bass. Traditional methods often revolve around arduous scales and complex theories, leaving many aspiring bass players feeling stuck, overwhelmed, and disheartened. Language Of Bass Method™ is meticulously crafted to fast-track progress for bassists who seek to shine alongside seasoned professionals without hours of daily practice. This method goes beyond learning notes and scales, focusing on understanding music as a language and leveraging the brain's innate language-learning capabilities, bridging the gap between theory and practical application. The Language of Bass book delves into critical strategies, including a single-practice approach, unlocking the secrets to rapid song learning, and correcting common language acquisition mistakes in musical journeys. Memory retention, ear training, and nurturing a unique musical voice are also critical components in this approach, fostering both technical skills and an intuitive feel for the instrument. The Language Of Bass Method Book covers everything from memory retention techniques for musical phrases to developing a unique musical voice. It also provides insights into effective vocabulary accumulation and the execution of musical ideas. The Language Of Bass Method™ isn't just about mastering an instrument; it's about embracing a new way of understanding and expressing music. For bassists who've been playing for years and are eager to break free from conventional learning methods and achieve fluency and creativity on the bass, The Language of Bass Method offers a transformative journey toward musical mastery. For a limited time, bassists who purchase The Language of Bass Book unlock an impressive collection of seven amazing bonuses – The 7-Day Fast Start video course, In The Pocket groove intensive course, Fretboard Speed Reading training, 10-Day Bass Chops Workshop, Navigating The Standards jazz masterclass, Effective Bass Player play-along kit, and the Gospel Bass Adrenaline shed session. These bonuses are carefully curated to complement the book's teachings, enabling bass players to accelerate their progress, enhance their technical skills, and deepen their musical understanding. For more information about The Language Of Bass Method™ and to purchase the book, please visit http://languageofbass.com/ . About BassGuitarTips.com BassGuitarTips.com is a dedicated platform aimed at enhancing bass playing. Founded by Alex Sampson, it offers innovative methods, expert insights, and resources to empower bass enthusiasts of all skill levels. Media Contact Company Name: BassGuitarTips.Com Contact Person: Alex Sampson Email: Send Email Country: United States Website: http://languageofbass.com/

author: 初审：董蕾 复审：张彦梅 终审：陈尤欣
title: 这些中考升学"捷径" 别信！都是套路-吉林省互联网联合辟谣平台
text:
中考，是同学们人生中的重要转折点，承载着无数的梦想与期待。然而，在这个关键时期，一些不法分子却蠢蠢欲动，企图利用考生和家长的紧张与期待心理实施诈骗。为了帮助大家避免上当受骗，守护中考的公平公正，网警为大家梳理了常见的中考骗局套路，希望大家提高警惕，增强防范意识。
01 考前
斩断信息迷雾，心无旁骛备考
骗子伪装成名校老师或教育专家，吹嘘自己有内部资料，让考生短时间内成绩大幅提升。
骗子会在网络上发布 "中考真题"" 绝密答案 " 等虚假信息，声称可以帮助考生提高成绩。
不法分子谎称“教育局内部渠道”“定向招生名额”，要求家长转账“指标费”“保证金”。
不法分子谎称自己是“顶级黑客”，帮助考生修改中考成绩。
02 考中
以考纪为尺，向网络作弊说“不”
不法分子会在网上发布 "专业通讯设备""免疫屏蔽” 等非法信息，声称可以在考生考试过程中利用该设备进行作弊。
不法分子在网上招募“枪手”，收取考生高额费用，意图实施作弊。
03 考后
慎析网络信息，严守个人隐私
伪造官方查分网站或志愿填报链接，诱导考生 输入身份证号、准考证号及密码，窃取个人信息。
伪造招生录取等虚假查分链接，严重甚至被植入木马病毒，盗取资金。
以“中考专项助学金”“优秀学生奖学金”为由，要求提供银行卡号、验证码或缴纳“手续费”。
网警提示
不轻信：对各种中考“捷径”信息保持高度警惕，不要轻易相信陌生人的承诺。
不点击：切勿随意点击短信、社交软件中来源不明的链接，避免进入钓鱼网站。
不透露：保护好考生的身份证号、准考证号、密码等重要个人信息，防止被不法分子利用。
不转账：涉及钱财交易时，一定要谨慎谨慎再谨慎。任何要求提前转账的“中考服务”都不参与。
来源： 中国互联网联合辟谣平台

author: PTI
title: Muslims stage silent protest at disputed Bhojshala complex in MP against ASI's ongoing survey
text:
Dhar (MP): Members of the Muslim community sporting black bands offered prayers at Bhojshala in Madhya Pradesh’s Dhar district on Friday to protest against the alleged excavation in some parts of the 11th-century complex, terming it as a violation of the Supreme Court directive.
A large number of Muslims turned up for the Friday namaz sporting black bands to protest the alleged physical excavation carried out by the Archaeological Survey of India as part of the court-mandated survey.
The ASI has been surveying the structure for the last 64 days as per the directives of the Madhya Pradesh High Court.
Hindus consider Bhojshala, an ASI-protected 11th-century monument, to be a temple dedicated to Vagdevi (Goddess Saraswati), while the Muslim community call it Kamal Maula Mosque.
The Hindu side's advocate, Shreesh Dube, said that leaders of the Muslim community were misinterpreting the apex court directive on the issue.
"We have submitted a memorandum addressed to the President of India citing that despite the Supreme Court's directive not to conduct physical excavation at the site, the ASI is excavating walls of the mosque and weakening them," Kamal Maula's mosque official Zulfikar Pathan told reporters after the Friday namaz.
Leaders of the community had raised the issue last Friday and announced that they would sport black bands in protest if there is no change in the ASI's ongoing survey, he said.
Pathan said they were staging a silent protest but will intensify their agitation if their demand is not heard.
In April, the Supreme Court refused to stay the “scientific survey” of the Bhojshala complex, making it clear that no physical excavation should be taken which would change the character of the premises in question.
However, Dube said, "The Supreme Court had said in its order that excavation should be done in such a manner that it will not change the basic structure of the site. The ASI is conducting its survey as per the necessity."
He claimed the Muslim community leaders were misinterpreting the SC's directive and engaging in a misleading campaign on the issue.
Under an arrangement made by the ASI on April 7, 2003, Hindus perform puja on the Bhojshala premises on Tuesdays, and Muslims offer 'namaz' in the complex on Fridays.
ADVERTISEMENT Published 24 May 2024, 15:31 IST

author: VNExplorer
title: Los multimillonarios deciden apostar por los submarinos de lujo en este nuevo año
text:
En el mundo de las embarcaciones exclusivas, una nueva tendencia está emergiendo entre los más acaudalados: un submarino con las prestaciones de un yate de alta categoría. Esta nueva apuesta, encabezada por la empresa austriaca Migaloo Private Submersible Yachts, está revolucionando el concepto de opulencia y privacidad bajo el agua. Con características extraordinarias como suites VIP, gimnasio de última generación, spa con jacuzzis, y una capacidad de sumersión que desafía los límites conocidos, el M5 redefine el concepto de lujo marítimo.
Migaloo, con su impresionante modelo M5, ofrece un híbrido entre un megayate y un submarino. Este coloso de 165 metros de largo no sólo incluye las comodidades esperadas en cualquier yate de alta gama, como helipuerto y piscina, sino que también añade las características únicas de un submarino, como la capacidad de sumergirse hasta 250 metros y permanecer bajo el agua durante aproximadamente cuatro semanas.
Características y prestaciones del híbrido marino
Migaloo
El Migaloo M5 se caracteriza por sus prestaciones únicas y exclusivas. Con una longitud de 165 metros, esta majestuosa embarcación está diseñada para alojar cómodamente hasta 40 personas, incluyendo a su tripulación y personal, asegurando así una experiencia íntima y exclusiva para sus ocupantes. La amplitud y el diseño del M5 permiten ofrecer una serie de comodidades que lo sitúan en una categoría propia dentro del mundo náutico.
Entre dichas comodidades las más significativas se encuentran sus suites VIP, que prometen un alojamiento de primera clase con la máxima privacidad y confort. Además, la embarcación alberga una sala de cine, ideal para el entretenimiento de los pasajeros en alta mar. La disponibilidad de un gimnasio de última generación y un spa con jacuzzis refuerza la idea de exuberancia y bienestar, ofreciendo a los huéspedes la oportunidad de relajarse y mantenerse en forma durante su estancia.
Expansión
Las innovaciones en entretenimiento son un componente clave del Migaloo M5. Equipado con una variedad de equipos de buceo, jet skis y kayaks, ofrece a los aventureros la posibilidad de explorar el entorno marino de una manera única y emocionante. Estas actividades no sólo enriquecen la experiencia a bordo, sino que también brindan una oportunidad inigualable para interactuar con el medio marino de una manera muy personal y directa.
El concepto de los submarinos privados no es completamente nuevo, pero Migaloo ha llevado la idea a otro nivel. El Migaloo M5 mezcla las características de los yates con las de los submarinos, resultando en una embarcación sin precedentes.
Tecnología y diseño del capitán de los mares
Expansión
El Migaloo M5 es una verdadera maravilla de la ingeniería náutica moderna, destacando por su impresionante diseño y tecnología avanzada. Con unas dimensiones colosales de 165,8 metros de eslora y 23 metros de manga, este submarino es una muestra de grandeza y sofisticación.
En el corazón de su funcionamiento, el Migaloo M5 está equipado con un sistema diésel eléctrico avanzado con AIP (Air Independent Propulsion), lo que le otorga una eficiencia y autonomía notables bajo el agua. Este sistema le permite alcanzar una velocidad máxima impresionante de 20 nudos en superficie y 12 nudos en inmersión, combinando así la elegancia de un yate exclusivo con la potencia y la agilidad de un submarino moderno. Esta capacidad le permite navegar y explorar con una agilidad inusual para un submarino de su tamaño.
Migaloo
El interior del Migaloo M5 es un testimonio de la extravagancia y la comodidad. Equipado con tecnología de vanguardia, ofrece televisión e internet vía satélite, manteniendo a los pasajeros conectados con el mundo exterior incluso en las profundidades del océano. Los muros táctiles interactivos añaden un toque futurista y funcional al entorno.
Además, el Migaloo M5 incluye varios complementos exclusivos que elevan aún más su estatus. Una de sus características más notables es la pista de aterrizaje para helicópteros, que no solo aumenta su accesibilidad, sino que también agrega un elemento de prestigio. El submarino también está equipado para desplegar minisubmarinos y motos de agua, ofreciendo así diversas opciones de exploración y recreación acuática, además de libertad de movimiento por el mar.
Valor y visión del Poseidón de los océanos
Migaloo
Este submarino se caracteriza por su innovación y sofisticación sin precedentes, por lo que no es extraño preguntarse cuánto cuesta esta maravilla. Con un valor estimado de 2.000 millones de euros (US$2.188 millones), el Migaloo M5 se perfila como uno de los objetos privados más caros del mundo.
Christian Gumpold, CEO de Migaloo, explica que la demanda actual de los propietarios de superyates busca rendimiento o diseño, además de privacidad, seguridad y experiencias únicas. En este sentido, los submarinos como este modelo representan el siguiente nivel en la evolución de las embarcaciones de alta categoría.
Los multimillonarios, siempre en búsqueda de nuevas experiencias y exclusividad, ahora encuentran en este capricho marino una alternativa fascinante a los yates convencionales. Estas embarcaciones ofrecen todas las comodidades y elegancia de un megayate, pero también añaden un nivel de privacidad y aventura único al permitir la exploración submarina.
Este avance representa un cambio significativo en las preferencias de los más acaudalados y podría marcar el comienzo de una nueva era en la industria de las embarcaciones de lujo. Con el Migaloo M5 y proyectos similares, el futuro la exclusividad y la exploración marítima parece estar, literalmente, sumergiéndose en nuevas y emocionantes terrenos.
Encuentre toda la información económica y de negocios de Colombia y el mundo en larepublica.co

author: Stephen Losey
title: Massive Boeing machinist strike hits KC-46 tanker production
text:
The massive strike by tens of thousands of Boeing machinists in Washington state will affect the company’s work on the KC-46 Pegasus refueling tanker , the company’s chief financial officer Brian West said Sept. 13.
West’s comments to the Morgan Stanley Laguna Conference came hours after more than 30,000 union members voted overwhelmingly to reject a contract and go on strike.
“The tanker program is going to be impacted by the (Boeing Commercial Airplanes) factory disruption, and now work stoppage,” West said. “That is going to flow through the tanker rates, which is going to be more cost pressure.”
The extent to which KC-46 production might be impacted was not immediately clear, nor was how the strike could impact other Boeing defense programs, such as the U.S. Navy’s P-8 Poseidon. Boeing builds the KC-46 on its 767 line in Everett, Washington, and the 737-derived P-8 in Renton, Washington.
Further statements from Boeing and the Defense Department on the strike’s defense program ramifications were not immediately available.
Boeing management and leaders of the International Association of Machinists districts 751 and W24 reached a tentative agreement on a deal for 33,000 union members that would include a 25% wage increase over the four-year life of the contract.
Union leaders this week told members that while the contract did not deliver everything they sought, it would be “the best contract negotiated in our history” and recommended accepting the deal.
“We have achieved everything we could in bargaining, short of a strike,” District 751 president Jon Holden said in a Monday message to union members.
But that deal fell short of the 40% increase the union originally sought, angering rank-and-file members. On Thursday — the final day of the old contract — more than 94% of union members voted to reject the contract and 96% voted to go on strike. Union members are now picketing Boeing facilities in Washington.
Boeing machinists voted overwhelmingly Thursday to reject a tentative contract and go on strike. This will affect operations at facilities like the company's Everett, Washington, plant where 767 aircraft are turned into KC-46 Pegasus tankers. (Jeff Martin/Staff) West said the company was “disappointed” by union members’ decision to reject a contract and go on strike.
“Initially, we were pretty pleased,” West said. “We had an unprecedented temporary agreement that was unanimously endorsed by union leadership. Over the last few days, it became loud and clear with our union members that that offer didn’t meet the mark. So there was a disconnect.”
Kelly Ortberg, Boeing’s new chief executive, is now speaking directly with workers to hear their concerns and figure out how to find an acceptable agreement, according to West.
A lengthy strike will hurt Boeing’s production, deliveries and operations and jeopardize its ability to recover from its many woes, West said. Those troubles most notably include quality and safety problems with its Max series of airliners.
In July, Boeing pleaded guilty to conspiracy to defraud the United States in connection with the crashes of two 737 Max aircraft. That followed a January incident in which the door plug of another 737 Max blew out in flight.
If the machinists’ strike is not resolved quickly, it could present further dangers for Boeing and its defense sector , which have already weathered one blow after another.
Fitch Ratings, one of the top international credit rating agencies, said Friday that Boeing “has limited headroom for a strike.” If the strike lasts a week or two, Fitch said, the company’s investment-grade credit rating is not likely to change.
But a longer strike, Fitch said, could seriously affect Boeing’s operations and financial outlook and increase the risk of a downgrade.
West said he is confident Boeing can balance its finances and debt and keep its credit rating investment-grade.
However, Boeing Defense, Space and Security is “still in recovery mode” and is likely to lose money in the third quarter, West said. These losses will in part be caused by cost pressures in Boeing’s fighter sector, as it ramps up production of the F-15EX Eagle II fighter and winds down work on the F-18 Hornet, according to West.
“Development hurdles” on the T-7 Red Hawk and MQ-25 Stingray programs, which are fixed-price contracts leaving Boeing on the hook for cost overruns, have also driven up costs, West said.
The U.S. Air Force awarded Boeing a $2.3 billion contract in November 2023 to build 15 more KC-46s, bringing the total number of Pegasus tankers on contract to 153. But the company has also taken significant losses on the program’s fixed-price contract, with the cost overruns topping $7 billion.
<span

author: Anthony Robledo
title: Viral photo of forlorn Spiral Hot Dogs owner leads to booming business
text: Customer's photo of forlorn owner in empty restaurant leads business to boom at OK diner Nick Chappell had never been to Spirals Hot Dogs & More before he took a photo of Scott Hosek in his empty restaurant. But after business boomed, Chappell's part of the Spirals family, Hosek says. [Anthony Robledo](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/7612431001/anthony-robledo/) An Oklahoma hot dog joint owner visibly wanted customers one day and he soon got more than he bargained for. During a slow shift on Dec. 20, a customer took a photo of Scott Hosek standing by his restaurant entrance waiting for diners and shared it on social media. Hosek would soon have no time to stand around as " [Spirals: Hot Dogs & More](https://spiralshotdogs.com/)," in Norman, Oklahoma, saw booming business once the post went viral. "We immediately started doing double digits in sales," Hosek told USA TODAY on Thursday. "It happened really fast to me." The day the photo was taken, Hosek found himself staring out the window upset his family business of four years wasn't booming as well as others ahead of Christmas. Hosek said he had no idea why Spirals saw a sudden wave of new customers after Dec. 20 until the person responsible for posting the photo, Nick Chappell, later apologized and offered to take the post down. Hosek wouldn't hear of it. "You just wouldn't expect it. Social media is amazing. It's amazing that people get involved with it," he said. "But more importantly, it's the stuff that you just don't think would work. That's what works." 'I will always love you': [See Dolly Parton grant Utah man's dying wish to meet her](/story/life/humankind/2023/12/26/dolly-parton-meets-longtime-fan/72033945007/) Customer knew he had to capture 'wholesome moment' Chappell visited the Norman area for his job as an Oklahoma Army National Guard. As part of their weekly hot dog Wednesday routine, Chappell and a his co-worker found Spirals on Google Maps and took a chance. Noticing Hosek gazing, Chappell decided to capture the "wholesome moment" on Snapchat captioning "He has been standing here waiting on customers to come in." "A good buddy of mine named Chad said, 'Hey, man, you can either post this on Facebook or I'm going to post this on Facebook. Some way or another we're going to get this guy some customers,'" Chappell said. In a Facebook post, Chappell gave an excellent recommendation of the restaurant, complimenting their food and "off the charts" service. He shared a photo of his dish, the menu and of Hosek waiting for diners. Chappell was blown away by the success of the post, which has since had over 2,000 shares, and even more surprised to see over 70 guests at the diner during his next visit. "I'm not a huge social media guy I typically don't share," Chappell said. "I don't even know really the words to describe it as but it made me even that much happier that I did make a post." Owner adds new 'Thunderbird' item in customer's honor Hosek is showing his gratitude by adding a new item in Chappell's honor. Having named hot dogs and bowls after family members, he was more than happy to do so. The "Thunderbird" is a hot link with bacon, cream cheese and jalapeños, Hosek said. The meal gets its name from the Thunderbird Unit Patch for the 45th Infantry, which Chappell is a part of. The two reconnected at the restaurant on Thursday, where they both got emotional talking about the post's impact. Chappell received a certificate of appreciation during the unveiling of the "Thunderbird" and was told he is now forever part of the Spirals family. "To know that it was a humble guy that just saw our need and did what he could. He doesn’t have a real following on social media, he hardly ever shares anything and to know that one post had so much power. It was super cool," Hosek added.

author: Redacción infocielo
title: Dante Spinetta se presentará gratis en Merdiano V de La Plata: conocé cuándo
text:
La Municipalidad de La Plata anunció que el músico Dante Spinetta se suma a la agenda de espectáculos gratuitos de las vacaciones de invierno en la ciudad. Qué otros artistas se suman a la grilla.
Como parte de la variada programación que impulsa la Municipalidad de La Plata durante las vacaciones de invierno, este viernes 25 de julio el reconocido músico y ex Illya Kuryaki and the Valderramas brindará un show en 17 y 71.
Llega Rock en Meridiano
Según informó el municipio, a lo largo de la jornada, el público podrá disfrutar de una propuesta de primer nivel con la presencia de uno de los referentes más destacados de la escena nacional, en una noche que se perfila como uno de los platos fuertes de la agenda cultural de la capital bonaerense.
El evento se llevará a cabo a partir de las 19:00hs en la emblemática esquina del barrio ferroviario. Además de Dante Spinetta, se presentarán Marki, Kiki Victoria y Daytona Fla.
La actividad se enmarca en la agenda invernal que diagramó la gestión del intendente Julio Alak, que contempla más de 600 propuestas culturales, recreativas y deportivas en diferentes puntos de la ciudad pensadas para disfrutar en familia durante el receso escolar.
Otros espectáculos en La Plata este fin de semana
Recientemente el municipio volvió a presentar el ciclo Música en la Glorieta en Plaza San Martín. Este sábado 26 de julio, desde las 15:00hs, en el escenario ubicado en Calle 53, entre 6 y 7, se presentarán Anuncio Project, Lara Fichera y Néstor Gómez Dúo y Midnight.
También en Noches Pasajeras, el ciclo del Centro Municipal de las Artes Pasaje Dardo Rocha, en 50, entre 6 y 7, habrá tres fechas importantes:
- El Jueves 24 de julio: La Bestia Folk + Baccarat
- El viernes 25 de julio: Mister América + Ibiza Pareo
- El sábado 26 de julio: Ramiro García Morete + La Ira de Jaqke
